Phelps LN, Chevalier M, Shanahan TM, Aleman JC, Courtney-Mustaphi C, Kiahtipes CA, Broennimann O, Marchant R, Shekeine J, Quick LJ, others (2020). “Asymmetric response of forest and grassy biomes to climate variability across the African Humid Period: influenced by anthropogenic disturbance?” Ecography, 43(8), 1118--1142. doi: 10.1111/ecog.04990 .

Vincens A, Lézine A, Buchet G, Lewden D, Le Thomas A (2007). “African pollen database inventory of tree and shrub pollen types.” Review of Palaeobotany and Palynology, 145(1-2), 135--141. doi: 10.1016/j.revpalbo.2006.09.004 .
